vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.27.31
§ Jaziz = "He makes prominent"
a Hagarite, officer of David in charge of the flocks
vocabInfos._es_Definition: agareno; funcionario; en tiempos del rey David
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
雅悉 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "他使為顯著"
一名夏甲人, 負責看管大衛的羊群 (代上27:30)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
雅悉 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "他使为显著"
一名夏甲人, 负责看管大卫的羊群 (代上27:30)
